snippet: Tampa Bay Rays pitcher Alex Cobb has tendinitis in his right forearm and will miss his planned opening day start against Baltimore on April 6.
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay Rays pitcher Alex Cobb has tendinitis in his right forearm and will miss his planned opening day start against Baltimore on April 6.

headline.main: Rays’ Alex Cobb to Miss Opening Day Start
headline.print_headline: Rays’ Cobb to Miss Opening Day Start
